headline: American Water Announces State Leadership Changes and New Customer Strategy Role
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., December 12, 2024--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced today a number of state leadership changes and the development of a key customer strategy role.

headline: American Water Shares Important Tips to Keep Customers Informed About Water Services
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., December 12, 2024--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., helps keep life flowing by providing safe, clean, reliable and affordable drinking water and wastewater services to customers. However, if emergencies or other issues arise that may impact service, we have several tips to help keep customers informed.
